document_data.name: Mordenkainen's Protection From Avians
document_data.mainbody: '''''Mordenkainen's protection from avians''''' was an uncommon protection [[spell]].
document_data.Effects: When cast, the caster was given protection from attacks by most avian creatures. The caster could cast this spell on another individual, but they had to come into physical contact during casting.
document_data.Components: In addition to [[Verbal component|verbal]] and [[somatic component|somatic]] components, the spell required a [[material component]], a feather with a strip of leather wrapped around it. The feather could come from any bird species.
